name: Zork Classics: Interactive Fiction
summary:
Zork Classics: Interactive Fiction is a compilation of nine Infocom text adventures set in the Zork universe.

Games in the compilation:
- Zork I: The Great Underground Empire
- Zork II: The Wizard of Frobozz
- Zork III: The Dungeon Master
- Beyond Zork: The Coconut of Quendor
- Zork Zero: The Revenge of Megaboz
- Enchanter
- Sorcerer
- Spellbreaker
- Wishbringer
